profile.description: I am a Full-Stack developer with extensive knowledge in different Back-end and Front-End programming languages. My ability to adapt quickly to new technologies and environments has allowed me to face challenges effectively. I consider myself a proactive, curious and oriented person to continuous improvement. My focus is on identifying obstacles and finding the best ways to overcome them. In addition, I value team collaboration and knowledge sharing with other professionals. I'm looking for a job and ready to take on new challenges!
